welcome_message_body: Welcome to London, Canada! Enjoy the city's charming parks, rich history, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and soak up all the beauty and culture this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Los Mariachis
restaurants.description: Los Mariachis is a mexican restaurant located in London.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at London International Airport serves primarily regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Centralia Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Centralia Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
